content:
PROCEDURE CODE
1163
If the doors are closed or if their opening is refused, the justice of the peace may request the assistance of the burgomaster or the police commissioner and have the doors and the furnishings opened in their presence.
If necessary, he may establish an internal or external garrison.
The Justice of the Peace shall rule on any difficulties. His order is enforceable notwithstanding any appeal and without prejudice to the principal.
